quote: 生命就像一盒巧克力，你永遠不知道下一顆是什麼味道。(Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.)
author: 阿甘 (Forrest Gump)
work: 阿甘正傳 (Forrest Gump, 1994)

quote: 願原力與你同在。(May the Force be with you.)
author: 多位角色 (Various Characters)
work: 星際大戰系列 (Star Wars Saga)

quote: 我思故我在。(I think, therefore I am.) - 角色引用笛卡爾
author: T-800 (角色引用)
work: 魔鬼終結者：創世契機 (Terminator Genisys, 2015)

quote: 去忙著活，或者忙著死。(Get busy living, or get busy dying.)
author: 安迪·杜佛蘭 (Andy Dufresne)
work: 刺激1995 / 肖申克的救贖 (The Shawshank Redemption, 1994)

quote: 能力越大，責任越大。(With great power comes great responsibility.)
author: 班叔叔 (Uncle Ben)
work: 蜘蛛人 (Spider-Man, 2002)

quote: 為什麼這麼嚴肅呢？(Why so serious?)
author: 小丑 (The Joker)
work: 黑暗騎士 (The Dark Knight, 2008)

quote: 道路不止一條。(There's more than one path to the top of the mountain.)
author: 師父 (Master Shifu)
work: 功夫熊貓 (Kung Fu Panda, 2008)

quote: 我會給他一個他無法拒絕的條件。(I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.)
author: 維托·柯里昂 (Vito Corleone)
work: 教父 (The Godfather, 1972)

quote: 你不可能同時處理真相！(You can't handle the truth!)
author: 納森·傑瑟普上校 (Col. Nathan R. Jessup)
work: 軍官與魔鬼 / 好人寥寥 (A Few Good Men, 1992)

quote: 即使是最小的人也能改變未來的進程。(Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.)
author: 凱蘭崔爾 (Galadriel)
work: 魔戒首部曲：魔戒現身 (The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, 2001)

quote: 我有一個感覺，我們不在堪薩斯了。(Toto, I've a feeling we're not in Kansas anymore.)
author: 桃樂絲 (Dorothy Gale)
work: 綠野仙蹤 (The Wizard of Oz, 1939)

quote: 我會回來的。(I'll be back.)
author: T-800
work: 魔鬼終結者 (The Terminator, 1984)

quote: 做，還是不做。沒有『試試看』這回事。(Do or do not. There is no try.)
author: 尤達大師 (Master Yoda)
work: 星際大戰五部曲：帝國大反擊 (Star Wars: Episode V – The Empire Strikes Back, 1980)

quote: 保持你的朋友親近，但讓你的敵人更親近。(Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.)
author: 麥可·柯里昂 (Michael Corleone)
work: 教父第二集 (The Godfather Part II, 1974)

quote: 有些鳥兒是關不住的，他們的羽毛太鮮亮了。(Some birds aren't meant to be caged. Their feathers are too bright.)
author: 瑞德 (Red)
work: 刺激1995 / 肖申克的救贖 (The Shawshank Redemption, 1994)

quote: 這才是剛開始一段美好友誼。(Here's looking at you, kid. / Louis, I think this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship.)
author: 瑞克·布萊恩 (Rick Blaine)
work: 北非諜影 / 卡薩布蘭卡 (Casablanca, 1942)

quote: 沒有湯給你喝！(No soup for you!)
author: 湯品納粹 (The Soup Nazi)
work: 歡樂單身派對 (Seinfeld, TV Series) - 雖為影集，但極其經典

quote: 人生得意須盡歡。(Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary.)
author: 約翰·基廷 (John Keating)
work: 春風化雨 / 死亡詩社 (Dead Poets Society, 1989)

quote: 秀逗啦！(Show me the money!)
author: 羅德·泰德威爾 (Rod Tidwell)
work: 征服情海 / 甜心先生 (Jerry Maguire, 1996)

quote: 你讓我變得完整。(You complete me.)
author: 傑瑞·麥奎爾 (Jerry Maguire)
work: 征服情海 / 甜心先生 (Jerry Maguire, 1996)

quote: 夢想更大一點，親愛的。(You gotta dream a little bigger, darling.)
author: 伊姆斯 (Eames)
work: 全面啟動 / 盜夢空間 (Inception, 2010)

quote: 為什麼我們要跌倒？這樣我們才能學會自己站起來。(Why do we fall? So that we can learn to pick ourselves up.)
author: 阿福·潘尼沃斯 (Alfred Pennyworth)
work: 蝙蝠俠：開戰時刻 (Batman Begins, 2005)

quote: 並非所有流浪者都迷失了方向。(Not all those who wander are lost.)
author: 比爾博·巴金斯 (Bilbo Baggins) (引用托爾金詩句)
work: 魔戒首部曲：魔戒現身 (The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, 2001)

quote: 我就是鋼鐵人。(I am Iron Man.)
author: 東尼·史塔克 (Tony Stark)
work: 鋼鐵人 (Iron Man, 2008)

quote: 傻瓜，跑啊！(Fly, you fools!)
author: 甘道夫 (Gandalf)
work: 魔戒首部曲：魔戒現身 (The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, 2001)

quote: 有些事情值得我們為之奮鬥。(Some things are worth fighting for.)
author: 多位角色 (例如：神力女超人)
work: 多部英雄電影

quote: 我們以我們的選擇來顯示我們真正是誰，這遠勝過我們的能力。(It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.)
author: 阿不思·鄧不利多 (Albus Dumbledore)
work: 哈利波特：消失的密室 (Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, 2002)

quote: 過去有時會讓人受傷。但依我看，你可以選擇逃避，或者從中學習。(The past can hurt. But the way I see it, you can either run from it or learn from it.)
author: 拉飛奇 (Rafiki)
work: 獅子王 (The Lion King, 1994)

quote: 這不是你能為你的國家做什麼，而是你能為自己做什麼來建立這個國家。(Ask not what your country can do for you – ask what you can do for your country.) - 電影中引用甘迺迪
author: 阿甘 (角色引用)
work: 阿甘正傳 (Forrest Gump, 1994)

quote: 敬那些做夢的傻瓜，儘管他們看起來有多傻。敬那些傷痕累累的心，敬我們製造的混亂。(Here's to the ones who dream, foolish as they may seem. Here's to the hearts that ache, here's to the mess we make.)
author: 米婭 (Mia)
work: 樂來越愛你 / 拉拉之地 (La La Land, 2016)
